text: Lisa Hartman (more often recognized as Lisa Hartman Black; June 1, 1956) is an American actress and singer. She has mostly acted on television. She starred on the short lived Tabitha in 1977â€“78. She also performed in the soap Knots Landing as the rock singer Ciji Dunne. Through the name Lisa Hartman, she recorded four solo records between 1976 and 1987. She was born around Houston, Texas. title: Lisa Hartman Black
